about_the_game:
Explore the mysteries of the pyramids with this Egyptian tileset for RPG Maker!

This Egyptian Tileset Includes:

Ground tiles:

Plain sand, plus lighter sand, darker sand, 2 kinds of textured rock, stone floor, stone floor with colored edges, assorted rock tiles, spike traps, tables, fences, grass and more!

Walls:

11 types of walls give you plenty of choices! Rock, shiny brick, designed edges and more…plus thatched roofs!

A surprising amount of foliage:

saguaro cactus
barrel cactus
prickly pears
lots of palm trees
dead trees and driftwood
potted plants
assorted scrub bushes and plants
yucca
plus more!

Interior tiles:

stairs
ladder
fences
benches
canopies
beds and interior furniture
windows

And for the pyramid:

lots of gold statues
wall sculptures
Egyptian silhouettes for walls
chairs
skeletons
treasure boxes
urns
and more!

And that’s not all, we have more exterior goodies:

A huge sphinx. Yes, the whole thing! You can even put a door on the front.
Rounded edge tiles. Use these to make organic edges for autotiles!
lots of rocks
arches and pillars
shadow and lighting tiles to add more depth!

Events and Animations

Light things up with three custom fire animations!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
